title: onesait Platform Architecture Overview
description: An Architecture Overview of the Platform, with explanation of all the modules, executables, third-party libraries, HA,... that conforms the platform
detailedDescription:
Documentation about the fundamental concepts behind onesait Platform architecture can be found on our guide [**Logical Modules of the Platform**](https://onesaitplatform.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OP/pages/196627/Architecture+Logical+Modules+of+the+Platform)

If you want to dig deeper in the onesaitPlatform's architecture you can consult several guides, including...

- [**Logical View & Building Blocks**](https://onesaitplatform.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OP/pages/35651699/Architecture+Logical+View+Building+Blocks)

- [**Datacentric Architecture**](https://onesaitplatform.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OP/pages/295022/Architecture+Why+onesait+Platform+implements+a+Data-Centric+Architecture)

- [**CAS Platform orientation**](https://onesaitplatform.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OP/pages/196635/Architecture+Our+bet+for+deployment+CaaS+Platforms)

- [**How to execute in Docker**](https://onesaitplatform.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OP/pages/360449/onesait+Platform+Cloud)

- [**Getting Started**](https://onesaitplatform.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OP/pages/33179/Getting+Started+with+onesait+Platform+CloudLab)
